item.title: Zuozhi Wang
item.description: About Me I’m a software engineer at Observe Inc. I graduated with my PhD in Computer Science from UC Irvine in 2023, under the supervision of Professor Chen Li. My research focuses are on the areas of distributed big data processing and query optimization. Email: zuozhi.wang [at] observeinc [dot] com Education 2017-2023 PhD, Computer Science; UC Irvine 2013-2017 BS, Computer Science; UC Irvine Project Highlights Texera, a system for scalable and collaborative data analytics using workflows.
